## ðŸ”¹ JMtwostage

**Description:**  
Implements two-stage joint modeling of longitudinal and survival outcomes for scenarios where traditional joint models may be computationally heavy. The package installed using the following code 

```r
# Install the remotes package if not already installed
install.packages("remotes")

# Install JMtwostage from GitHub
remotes::install_github("kumarbhrigu/JMtwostage")
```

- ðŸ”— [GitHub](https://kumarbhrigu.github.io/JMtwostage/)
- ðŸ“„ [Documentation](https://kumarbhrigu.github.io/JMtwostage/)
